name: Enry's Island
tag_list: incubator, business-angel, communication, gaming, social-network, greentech, renewable-energy, ict, information-technology, web-agency, clean-tech, fashion, investments, start-up, consulting
overview:
Through mentorship and seed funding, Enry’ Island supports start-up, along the process of its incubation, assist them in defining commercial strategies, product development, business planning, partnerships configurations and investment strategies. They provide a series of services to speed up start-ups development: an inspiring business approach, marketing, financial and legal consultancy, web agency services, business model generation.

Enry’ Island outline to start-uppers, the main difference between motivations and investment criteria of a BA and a VC. They guide them in fully understanding the essential elements of the venture capital term sheet, from terms related to economics to terms related to control. They introduce the various participant in the process, discuss how fund raising works, reveal how BA and VC operate and describe how to apply different negotiation tactics to a specific deal. They attract BA and VC to entrepreneurs. They chase Seed funding, Early stage and First Round ventures. They define together with the founders, the best possible strategy to getting a fair deal.
